title: Waterbom Bali Splash (Half-day)
overview: A fun-filled half-day at Asia’s top water park, with thrilling slides and relaxing pools.

stops.description: Arrive at Waterbom Bali and enjoy water slides, pools, and attractions.

title: Ultimate Waterbom Bali Day (Full-day)
overview: A full day at Waterbom Bali, with time for all the rides, lunch, and relaxation in the tropical gardens.

stops.description: Arrive and enjoy all the slides and pools.
Lunch at one of the park’s restaurants.
Continue to enjoy the attractions or relax in a cabana.
